name: Nest Evac
description:
A game built with 24a2 about evacuating (or sacrificing) people stuck in a cage with a hungry monster!

Select a unit and press "Q" to evacuate it and get points! There are 3 types of evacuees giving a different amount! Keep in mind, that it will make the monster turn to the direction of the evacuation! If you want to make the monster reverse its direction, select a unit and sacrifice it with "W", but keep in mind, that this will remove some points and count as a loss!

Every time the monster eats a captive, you also lose some points! The game is lost when you lose 10 units. You win when you evacuate 25!

Use "R" (or click the button) to restart the game!

Made as a submission for Alternative Engine Jam #3.

This game is open source and released under the MIT licence. Here's the source code!
